backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, categories, orders, user profiles, menu seeding, and authorization‑protected admin/user operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, Open Graph tags, and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes, layout, admin‑protected sections, and global providers.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart items with localStorage persistence and helper methods for updates.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin privileges or login, with optional error messaging.
Route guard that checks authentication and admin status, showing skeletons or access‑denied states when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears React Query cache on logout with error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/brand/PremiumTag: Renders the brand’s tagline pulled from cafe37Content.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogO: Shows an alert explaining ordering is done through partners and provides Zomato, WhatsApp, and phone links.
frontend/src/components/home/HomePromoCa: Implements an autoplaying image carousel with hover pause, slide tracking, and fallback UI for failed images.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with branding, contact info, quick links, social sharing, and Google ratings.
frontend/src/components/nav/Header.tsx: Provides the site header with navigation, mobile menu, branding, login, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/ordering/OnlineO: Shows ordering options via Zomato, WhatsApp, or phone in default or compact layouts.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderViaC: Displays a dialog-based CTA letting users order via WhatsApp or phone for a specific product.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders category filter buttons allowing selection of item categories or all items.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image, name, description, price, availability badge, and contact order CTA.
frontend/src/components/reviews/GoogleRa: Fetches and displays Google rating info in multiple layout variants with fallback messaging and optional link.
frontend/src/components/states/ErrorStat: Renders an error alert with title, message, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSk: Provides skeleton loaders for product cards, product grids, and tables.
frontend/src/content/cafe37.ts: Exports static Cafe 37 business info including hours, address, contact links, and highlights.
frontend/src/content/homepageSlides.ts: Defines homepage slide data with IDs, images, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/content/menuCategories.ts: Contains legacy hardcoded menu categories and a helper to resolve display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch products, categories, menus, catalog data, and create orders using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, base typography, and utility classes including accessibility and scrollbar helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the café’s About page with hero section, story content, feature highlights, and an image.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Provides CRUD management for product categories with dialogs, form handling, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin dashboard stats for products, categories, menu items, and orders, with navigation to management sections and error/loading indicators.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditMenuPa: Displays and allows seeding of legacy menu data, with category selection and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoogleRevi: Lets admins configure Google Places API keys and fallback messaging for review display, with form validation and update handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin order detail page that loads an order by ID, handles loading/error states, and displays items and customer info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin orders list showing all orders with loading/error states and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page with CRUD dialogs, form handling, and product catalog loading.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays an order prompt with online ordering options and a button to navigate to the menu.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no content.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Same layout as CartPage, offering ordering options and a link back to the menu.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows location map, contact actions, facilities list, and general visit info for the café.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero content, contact shortcuts, promo carousel, and café highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MenuRedirectPage.tsx: Immediately redirects users to the /menu route while showing a loading indicator.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with loading and error states, image, price, description, and contact-based ordering.
frontend/src/pages/TextMenuPage.tsx: Displays a scrollable public menu by grouping products into category sections, handling loading/error states, and enabling smooth navigation between sections.
frontend/src/utils/businessHours.ts: Utility for business hours including schedule data, open/closed checks, and formatted outputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versioning, features, requests, and admin dashboard-related project state.
